categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Shirley Henderson (born November 24, 1965) is a Scottish actress who voiced Babu Frik in Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. She is known for roles such as Moaning Myrtle in Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets and Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, Jude in the Bridget Jones trilogy, and Gail in the black comedy crime film Trainspotting, starring fellow Star Wars actor Ewan McGregor.
